name: Alok Agarwal
content: RoleRaise helped me land a role at Twitter, and their ongoing guidance was instrumental in securing my position at Meta. I truly recommend this platform.

name: Neelabh Dubey
content: Being on STEM OPT had its challenges, but with the network and support from RoleRaise, I was able to land my role at Apptad. I'm truly grateful for their guidance.

name: Asad Anees
content: The expert mentorship from RoleRaise helped me secure my position at RetailStat as a Senior Data Scientist/AI Engineer. I wholeheartedly recommend their team and mentors.

name: Pranjal Gupta
content: The interview prep and hands-on coaching I received from my mentors were game-changers. Thanks to RoleRaise, I not only cracked the role but also built skills that will last a lifetime.

name: Ratul C.
content: Switching companies is challenging, but the comprehensive support from RoleRaise made all the difference in landing my role at CBA.

name: Sahil Chaudhary
content: RoleRaise helped me land my dream Big Four position at KPMG Global. Their mentorship and industry connections were invaluable.

name: Saurabh Anand
content: The guidance and encouragement from my RoleRaise mentors helped me secure my Associate Director role. I'm extremely grateful for their support.
